meanings.definition: The office or residence of a nuncio.
meanings.sent1: The nunciatures were beautifully decorated with flags and flowers.
meanings.sent2: We visited the historic nunciatures in the city center.
meanings.sent3: The nunciatures looked like colorful castles from a fairy tale.
meanings.sent4: The nunciatures stood tall, symbolizing diplomacy and grace.
meanings.sent5: The grandeur of the nunciatures left a lasting impression on the visitors.

meanings.definition: The official residence of a papal nuncio.
meanings.sent1: The papal nuncio welcomed guests to his elegant nunciatures.
meanings.sent2: Visitors were in awe of the opulence of the papal nunciatures.
meanings.sent3: The papal nunciatures had a secret garden that was a favorite spot for meditation.
meanings.sent4: The papal nunciatures exuded a sense of divine presence.
meanings.sent5: The history within the walls of the papal nunciatures was palpable.
